name: Ages
note: Very important app that will tell you if a 99 years old person is a baby or an adult.
howToUse: Enter the persons age. Check if they are baby, adult or elderly. Be impressed.

name: Division
note: Very important app that checks if a number is divisible to 2, 3, 6, 7 or 10.
howToUse: Enter a number in the input field and see if it is divisible to one or more of the numbers above. Be impressed.

name: Rounding numbers
note: Very important app that will round any floating point number to a given precision.
howToUse: Enter a number in the input field and see if it is divisible to one or more of the numbers above. Be impressed.
